creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: two and one half lines of soft, looping calligraphy; oval relief seal URC; large square relief seal LL; smaller square intaglio seal LL
inscription: 漫々〇濤立　翠雲深幾重　山中罕人車　終日撫蒼龍 (Over vast expanses, the wild waves surge, / Blue-green clouds, how many layers thick? / Here in the mountains, few carriages or men; / All day I spend caressing these hoary dragons!) (SA)
markings: URC, oval relief; LL, square relief; LL, square intaglio
text:
漫々〇濤立　翠雲深幾 / 重　山中罕人車　終日撫 / 蒼龍
Over vast expanses, the wild waves surge, / Blue-green clouds, how many layers thick' / Here in the mountains, few carriages or men; / All day I spend caressing these hoary dragons! 
(Trans. Stephen Addiss)
title: Amid the Mountains
